ModMetaData.name: UnderWhere
ModMetaData.author: Malistaticy, Dhyne
ModMetaData.description:
UnderWhere underwear mod
Most pawns will now spawn with underwear of appropriate type. 4 new apparel sets for male, female, tribals, and cold climate. More are on the way!
Special thanks to Dhyne for the 1.1 port and Orion for teaching me how to use comps
